product_name: REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Crew Shirt - Men's Tall
long_description: Wearing a warm, wicking base layer like the men's tall REI Midweight Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) crew in cold weather can make the difference between days to remember and those to forget. Sleeves are 1.5 in. longer and hem is 2 in. longer than the regular REI Midweight Polartec Power crew. Polartec Power Dry uses 2 different yarns on either side of the fabric to enhance comfort: interior yarn wicks moisture, and exterior yarn dries quickly. Combination of the 2 yarns helps keep you dry during highly aerobic activities because it moves moisture away from skin faster than single-component fabrics such as cotton. Fabric offers a UPF rating of 30 to protect against harmful UV light. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin, and raglan seams are designed to be comfortable when wearing pack straps on your shoulders. Underarm and side gussets promote freedom of motion and reduce chafing under a hipbelt. Longer length helps top stay tucked in, and smooth texture of outer surface helps it slide easily under extra layers. The REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry crew in men's tall sizes features a next-to-skin fit that hugs the body.
